ability.Solar Power: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x and loses 1/8 max HP per end of turn.

Flare Blitz.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. User receives recoil damage equal to 1/3 the damage dealt to the target. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move does not check accuracy.

Air Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move has 50% accuracy.

Inferno Cyclone.effect: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move always burns the target.

Sky Blaze.effect: Raises the user's Speed by 1 stage if this move knocks out the target.

Heat Wave.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents and has a 10% chance to burn each.
